item.title: At Least 11 People Killed After Car Plows Into Vancouver Filipino Festival
item.description: Dozens of people were also reported injured after a car drove into a Filipino community festival in British Columbia, the police said.

item.title: Valentin-Yves Mudimbe, 83, Dies; African Scholar Challenged the West
item.description: He deconstructed what he called “the colonial library”: the accounts of Africa by Europeans whose aim, he said, was to further colonialism.

item.title: Monday Briefing: Canada Is Electing a New Leader
item.description: Plus, when a child’s life is the family business.

item.title: Why Australia Wants to Set Caps on International Students
